title.value: Fungicidal activity of alcoloid-containing preparations in relation to grey mold and alternaria blight of white head cabbage
Фунгицидная активность алкалоидсодержащих препаратов по отношению к возбудителям серой гнили и альтернариоза капусты белокачанной

journal.title: Vegetable Growing : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Popov, F.A., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center for Arable Farming (Belarus). Institute of Plant Protection

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were presented data on studying the fungicidal activity of alcoloid-containing preparations obtained from lupine cv Sinij gorjkiy in relation to fungi Botrytis cinerea and Alternaria brassicae - grey mold and alternaria blight of white cabbage (Brassica oleracea convar. capitata var. alba L.) agents. A high fungitoxicity of preparations No 1, 2 and 8 to the given phytopathogens is determined, which inhibit the disease agents pure culture colonies growth for 60,0-84,4%. The fungicidal features of preparations are proved by growth coefficient indices. There was determined the effect of the preparations on reproductive ability of pathogens, which was differentiated depending on the preparation itself and its concentration. The studies revealed no destructive changes in the morphogenesis of pathogens when treated by alkaloid-containing preparations. With regard to cultural traits, their variability by the experimental variants was insignificant. The obtained results testify to the efficiency of vegetative origin preparations using them in a system of vegetable crop protection against the diseases.
